item.title: Report X-2024071673
item.description:
Report X-2024071673

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-18
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Pkg flagged for Hazmat Acceptance Process (HAP) and removed form system flow. Pkg has no Hazmat diamonds or markings other than the OP-900LL Hazmat tera-away tags. Pkg missing required Hazmat Certification and OP-900LL Hazmat tags are unusable as substitute Certification. Inspection of pkg found concealed damage to 1 x 30 lbs. gas cylinder. Carrying handles are crushed/bent due to inadequate packing material and orientation of contents in the pkg.

item.title: Report X-2024071517
item.description:
Report X-2024071517

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-30T12:20:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-12
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package is a case of four 1-gallon bottles decalcifier for histology use. Has loose caps, experienced compression/crushing, leaked. Caps not secured w/ tape or by other means. Liquids not bagged to prevent release. Relatively tall container unlikely to remain upright during transport and sort.

item.title: Report X-2024071435
item.description:
Report X-2024071435

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-12
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The box is marked with a corrosive diamond. The box contains 2X1gal bottles of Zep Industrial Purple Degreaser. The side of the box is wet from the leaking 1X1gal bottle. The cap is loose on the bottle. The other bottle is soiled from leakage.

item.title: Report X-2024071615
item.description:
Report X-2024071615

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-29T09:15:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-04
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Tape failed on bottom closures allowing contents to fall out. One box of CO2 cylinders found with one cylinder inside. Contents permitted to ship as Ltd Qty - no Hazmat markings of any kind found on outer carton.
